name: Deeper Dabbler
summary: With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day.
description:
With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day. You can create two additional talismans during your daily preparations.

Special You can select this feat a second time if you are 14th level or higher.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
